titleStmt.title: Full satisfaction concerning the affaires of Ireland; as they relate to the Marquesse of Ormonds transactions, with the Lord of Inchiquin. Together, with a cleare demonstration how advantagious the Lord of Inchiquins actings have beene to the Protestant religion, and interest of England. / Impartially delivered from an able hand there, and accordingly faithfully published.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the generall satisfaction of such as desire to be truely informed of the proceedings there,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the generall satisfaction of such as desire to be truely informed of the proceedings there
